sentence.Network_en: The legal aid system should be accessible to more people.
sentence.Network_cn: 法律援助制度应该面向更多人。

sentence.Network_en: This vast archive has been indexed and made accessible to researchers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个存量巨大的档案室的所有文件都已编了索引，可供研究人员使用。

sentence.Network_en: The causeway to the island is only accessible at low tide.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往该岛的堤道只有在枯潮时才能通行。

means.word_mean: 敞开的,不设防的,易受影响的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from late Latin accessibilis, from Latin access- 'approached', from the verb accedere (see accede)

entry.tran: 易到达的;易进入的;易够到的
entry.def: If a place or building is accessible to people, it is easy for them to reach it or get into it. If an object is accessible, it is easy to reach.

example.ex: The Centre is easily accessible to the general public...
example.tran: 该中心普通大众可随意进入。
该场所轮椅可以自由出入。

entry.def: If something is accessible to people, they can easily use it or obtain it.

example.ex: The legal aid system should be accessible to more people...
example.tran: 法律援助制度应该面向更多人。

example.ex: This device helps make virtual reality a more usable and accessible technology.
example.tran: 这一装置有助于使虚拟现实成为更可用、更便利的技术。

entry.def: If you describe a book, painting, or other work of art as accessible, you think it is good because it is simple enough for people to understand and appreciate easily.

example.ex: ...literary books that are accessible to a general audience.
example.tran: 一般读者都能欣赏的文学作品

example.ex: ...their reputation for providing exciting and accessible theatre for young people.
example.tran: 他们在为年轻人奉献喜闻乐见的精彩戏剧方面是出了名的

means.word_mean: 2. capable of being read with comprehension;

sentences.sentence: "the tales seem more approachable than his more difficult novels"

means.word_mean: 4. easy to get along with or talk to; friendly;

auth_sentence.content: The house has been designed in an accessible way.
auth_sentence.res_content: The house has been designed in an accessible way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The house has been designed in an accessible way.

auth_sentence.content: Some of the services are more accessible than others.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of the services are more accessible than others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some of the services are more accessible than others.

auth_sentence.content: Which disabled people can legitimately use an accessible loo?
auth_sentence.res_content: Which disabled people can legitimately use an accessible loo?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which disabled people can legitimately use an accessible loo?

stems_affixes.word_buile: access[n.接近;入口 v.存取, 接近]+ible能……的→adj.能接近的;可进去的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
excess[n.过度,过剩]+ive……的→adj.过分的;过度的
in不+accessible[adj.能接近的;可进去的]→adj.难以接近的
suc随后+cess行走,前进+ive……的→随后跟上→连续的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+or人→走在前面的人→祖先
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+ry整体→n.祖先;世系,家世
con共同+cess后退+ion动作或状态→n.让步;退位
ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ary物→n.必需品

stems_affixes.value_cn: 必要性, 需要,必需品
stems_affixes.word_buile: ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ity性质,特性等→n.必要性, 需要,必需品
process[n.过程;进行 v.加工, 处理]+ion表名词→向前走的队伍
re回+cess行走,前进→走回去→休息
re回+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→走回去→撤退
suc随后+cess行走,前进→随后跟上→继续→继续做→成功

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接连发生,继承, 继任
stems_affixes.word_buile: suc随后+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→随后跟上→继续发生→继续别人[事业,成功]→继承, 继任

Sentence.sentence: Adult day-care centers are easily accessible.

means.word_mean: 容易取得的，容易获得的，容易达到的

sentences.en: Medicine should not be kept where it is accessible to children.
sentences.cn: 药物不应放在容易被小孩拿到的地方。

sentences.en: Such information is not really accessible.
sentences.cn: 这种信息不是很容易得到的。

means.word_mean: 可接近的，可进入的；易接近的，易进入的

sentences.en: The island is accessible only by boat.
The remote desert area is accessible only by helicopter.
sentences.cn: 只有乘直升机才能进入那遥远的荒漠地区。

sentences.en: Her poetry is always very accessible.
